In Haiti rescue crews and civilians were digging through the rubble looking for survivors of last night's five point nine magnitude earthquake that hit the northern part of the country when a strong five point to magnitude aftershock hit the same area
At least twelve people are dead more than one hundred or injured the country's president said today he will make sure proper systems are in place to help the victims but Haiti is still recovering from the twenty ten earthquake that killed at least two hundred twenty thousand people and destroyed much of the capital city
